settings.name: start_inventory_removes_from_pool
settings.description: Removes starting inventory from the multiworld pool.

settings.name: preset
settings.description: The preset is used by the Randomizer to know which techniques are available to reach the items locations.

values.name: newbie
values.description: New to randomizers, but completed Super Metroid 100% and knows basic techniques (Wall Jump, Shinespark, Mid-air Morph)

values.name: casual
values.description: Occasional rando player. No hell runs or suitless Maridia, some easy to learn tricks in logic.

values.name: regular
values.description: Plays rando regularly. Knows tricks that are not too hard and open up the game.

values.name: veteran
values.description: Experienced rando player. Harder everything, some tougher tricks in logic.

values.name: expert
values.description: Knows almost all tricks: full suitless Maridia, Lower Norfair hell runs, hi-jumpless Lava Dive (mania difficulty only)

values.name: master
values.description: Everything on hardest, all tricks known.

values.name: smrat2021
values.description: Settings used for Super Metroid Randomizer Accessible Tournament 2021

settings.name: start_location
settings.description: Where Samus will begin the game.

settings.name: remote_items
settings.description: Indicates you get items sent from your own world. This allows co-op play of a world. If unsure, set to Off.

settings.name: death_link
settings.description: If one DeathLinked player dies, all of them do.

values.name: enable_survive
values.description: If you have any energy in Reserve Tanks, you will survive.

settings.name: max_difficulty
settings.description: Depending on the perceived difficulties of the techniques, bosses, hell runs etc. from the preset, it will prevent the Randomizer from placing an item in a location too difficult to reach with the current items.

settings.name: morph_placement
settings.description: Influences where the randomizer will place Morphing Ball.

settings.name: strict_minors
settings.description: Instead of using the Minors proportions as probabilities, enforce a strict distribution to match the proportions as exactly as possible.

settings.name: missile_qty
settings.description: For each minor types, the higher the number the higher the probability of choosing it when placing a minor.

settings.name: super_qty
settings.description: For each minor types, the higher the number the higher the probability of choosing it when placing a minor.

settings.name: power_bomb_qty
settings.description: For each minor types, the higher the number the higher the probability of choosing it when placing a minor.

settings.name: minor_qty
settings.description: From 7%: minimum number of minors required to finish the game to 100%: all minors locations contain a minor (vanilla like).

settings.name: energy_qty
settings.description: Choose how many Energy/Reserve Tanks will be available.

values.name: ultra_sparse
values.description: 0-1 tanks; Mother Brain's Rainbow Beam only does 20 damage instead of 300

settings.name: area_randomization
settings.description: Randomize areas together using bidirectional access portals. Check the VARIA website for the full list of what this entails. Use caution, as this can cause softlocks.

values.name: light
values.description: Keep the same number of transitions between areas as in vanilla

settings.name: area_layout
settings.description: Some layout tweaks to make your life easier in Areas Randomizer.
settings.readableName: Additional layout patches for easier navigation

settings.name: doors_colors_rando
settings.description: Randomizes the colors of red, green, and yellow doors. Also adds four new type of doors which require Ice/Wave/Spazer/Plasma beams to open them.

settings.name: allow_grey_doors
settings.description: Generates grey doors, which are permanently locked.

settings.name: boss_randomization
settings.description: Randomize Golden 4 bosses access doors (Kraid, Phantoon, Draygon, Ridley) using bidirectional access portals (the same access portals as in Areas randomization).

settings.name: fun_combat
settings.description: Forces removal of Plasma Beam and Screw Attack, if the preset and settings allow it. In addition, can randomly remove Spazer and Wave from the Combat set.

settings.name: fun_movement
settings.description: Forces removal of Space Jump if the preset allows it. In addition, can randomly remove Hi Jump, Grapple, Spring, Speed, and/or Bombs from the Movement set.

settings.name: fun_suits
settings.description: If the preset and seed layout allow it, will force removal of at least one suit upgrade.

settings.name: layout_patches
settings.description: Include the anti-softlock layout patches. Disable at your own softlocking risk! Using a non-standard start location will force this setting on.

settings.name: varia_tweaks
settings.description: Include minor tweaks for the game to behave 'as it should' in a randomizer context. Using a non-standard start location will force this setting on.

settings.name: nerfed_charge
settings.description: Samus begins with a starter Charge Beam that works at â…“ capacity. Once the Charge Beam item has been collected, it does full damage and special attacks are back to normal.

settings.name: gravity_behaviour
settings.description: Modifies the properties of the Varia and Gravity suits.

values.name: balanced
values.description: Removes Gravity environmental protection, doubles Varia's

values.name: progressive
values.description: Gravity has 50% heat protection, each suit gives 50% more enemy/environment protection

settings.name: elevators_doors_speed
settings.description: Accelerate doors and elevators transitions.

settings.name: spin_jump_restart
settings.description: Allows Samus to start spinning in mid air after jumping or falling.

settings.name: rando_speed
settings.description: Allows Samus to keep her horizontal momentum when landing on the ground.

settings.name: infinite_space_jump
settings.description: Space jumps can be done quicker and at any time in air, water or lava, even after falling long distances.

settings.name: refill_before_save
settings.description: Refill energy and ammo when saving.

settings.name: hud
settings.description: Displays the current area name and the number of remaining items of selected item split in the HUD for the current area.

settings.name: animals
settings.description: Replace saving the animals in the escape sequence by a random surprise.

settings.name: no_music
settings.description: Whether to disable music. If disabled, this also turns off MSU-1 patches. If you're streaming and turning this off to play your own music, please be mindful of licensing.

settings.name: random_music
settings.description: Randomize the background music.

locations.name: Missile (lower Norfair above fire flea room)
Power Bomb (lower Norfair above fire flea room)
Power Bomb (right Maridia sand pit room)
